desc: Canary Garden Learning Centre's pupils benefit from small class sizes, ensuring each child receives a high level of attention. We follow UK National Curriculum & Montessori Approach. We also adopt Japanese Project Based Learning method for STREAM subjects: science, technology, reading, engineering, art and mathematic

layout.text: A Learning Centre follows UK Approach
Canary Garden Learning Centre is a modern, light and well-resourced space, nestled in Batu Pahat, Johor.
